name: UnWelcomed (SCP-610)
description:
This Game Is based on SCP-610: http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-610

When your mission to explore some infected town goes terribly wrong, you are left alone to explore and look for help. Yet, you quickly realize that you are far from alone...

////

To help me make more games you can check out my patreon: https://www.patreon.com/CinetikEnergy

////

This game is not canon for the story of SCP-610, it was just based on it.
